attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN!!!!
attributes.review: This is RIDICULOUS wants MY PHONE NUMBER TO CALL ME I agreed because I really wanted the app!!! Thinking it would only be a few calls here and there but IT WAS EVERYDAY NONSTOP I COULD BARELY GET SLEEP AT NIGHT! My husband Richard was having a SEIZURE I COULDNT EVEN CALL 911 BECAUSE THEY KEPT CALLING!!!!!! Luckily we had a house phone! Everyday I would get texts saying make America Great again and get of your rump and vote for Trump!! Are you SERIOUS DONALD!!! Fix your app AND FIX AMERICA!!! -Karen

attributes.title: Bad graphics
attributes.review:
Horrible graphics 1/10. I couldnâ€™t even walk around in game without my phone having a stroke.
Another thing, the plot is extremely boring. No creativity or interesting events. Worse than fortnite and pubg.
The only part I liked was when the final boss, the police, barged into my house in the middle of the night and made me go to therapy.
